overview:
Assistant Professor (Clinical) Communication Sci & Disorders University of Utah

Teaching philosophy is traditional in that it is lecture based with the support of audiovisual technology such as powerpoint slides, videos, etc. My lectures are designed for students to learn audiology concepts and terminology that they can then integrate and apply to the clinical experience.

Summer 2012

Clinical Internship US Independent Study US Clinical Rotation US Speech Acoustics US Location: MBH 302 (Milton Bennion Hall), BU C 108 (Bus Classroom Bldg)
